title: Pixel 3 - Can't Reach Google at the Moment, really often
content: About 1/3 of the times I try to use Google Assistant with my voice I get this error. No matter if I'm on wifi or while I'm in full LTE coverage. Once I try again, it works fine without me moving or doing anything but trying again.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
